property.name: sqlPurge
property.value: DELETE FROM ${database.schema}.route WHERE id NOT IN (SELECT distinct routeId FROM ${database.schema}.vehiclejourney)

property.name: sqlInsert
property.value: INSERT INTO ${database.schema}.Route ( objectid, objectversion, creationtime, creatorid, name, oppositerouteid, lineid, publishedname, NUMBER, direction, COMMENT, wayback ) VALUES(?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)

property.name: sqlSelectByObjectIdWithInClause
property.value: SELECT id,objectid FROM ${database.schema}.Route WHERE objectid IN (_OBJECTIDS_)

property.name: sqlUpdate
property.value: UPDATE ${database.schema}.Route SET objectid = ?, objectversion = ?, creationtime = ?, creatorid = ?, name = ?, oppositerouteid = ?, lineid = ?, publishedname = ?, NUMBER = ?, direction = ?, COMMENT = ?, wayback = ? WHERE objectid = ?
